title: Metal Gothic Soundtrack 15 Songs Pack
description: A Melodic Metal Gothic Hard Rock Epic Orchestral instrumental Track to suite your specific scene, boss fight, character theme or title sequence perfectly
longDescription:
The Forgotten Minority. An album buy Eons After that contains 13 Tracks (Plus 2 Bonus) of Melodic Metal instrumentals with Orchestral instruments, Gothic Choirs and Electronic elements designed for Soundtrack, background and atmospheric purposes that incorporate big, chunky, aggressive, hard hitting, punchy, powerful, evil and dark haunting sounds to suite your specific scene, boss fight, character theme or title sequence perfectly.


Many of these songs have progressive buildup sections that add instrumental elements after 4,8 or 16 Loopable bars that creates a feeling of become darker, closer, scarier, revealing itself, etc, and would suite increasing levels of intensity, threat, attack, danger, etc.


The 13 Tracks all consists of the original and all the sections of each track in 2,4,8,16, etc, bar loops individualised to give multiple options and be looped seamlessly as required:

(A GRAND TOTAL OF 241 LOOPS!!!)


Please also note, on the 2 additional "Bonus" tracks "Symbiotic Devolution" & "Resisting the Lure of the Sensational", they have the original track and a Looped track with all the sections ready for editing.


If you purchase, please send me a message so I can add your game to my portfolio and give you free advertising in return. Thanks


Track 1: Forever in the Pull of the Maelstrom 4:02 Mins (Original) 6 Mins (21 Loops)

Track 2: Poor in Peace, Prosperous in War, 2:19 Mins (Original) 3 Mins (11 Loops)

Track 3: Shadowing Death 3:50 Mins (Original) 6 Mins (25 Loops)

Track 4: Optimistic Ideals, Blackened Heart 4:32 Mins (Original) 7 Mins (28 Loops)

Track 5: Social Monopolists 2:28 Mins (Original) 4 Mins (16 Loops)

Track 6: Suffering should Suffice 2:14 Mins (Original) 3 Mins (18 Loops)

Track 7: Benefiting from the Exploited 3:24 Mins (Original) 5 Mins (21 Loops)

Track 8: Surpus Requirements 3:12 Mins (Original) 4 Mins (12 Loops)

Track 9: Leading the flock to the Slaughter 3:44 Mins (Original) 4 Mins (19 Loops)

Track 10: Taking Pride in Plagiarism 4:59 Mins (Original) 7 Mins (23 Loops)

Track 11: Beckoning the Needy 2:08 Mins (Original) 2 Mins (13 Loops)

Track 12: Standing Uncorrected 2:31 Mins (Original) 4 Mins (15 Loops)

Track 13: Osmium's Presence 3:58 Mins (Original) 5 Mins (18 Loops)

Track 14 (Bonus 1): Symbiotic Devolution 3:15 Mins (Original) 4 Mins (1 file of Loops)

Track 15 (Bonus 2): Resisting the Lure of the Sensational 2:49 Mins (Original) 4 Mins (1 file of Loops)

Listen HERE on Soundcloud
